title: Microsoft Teams: Follow Office preview policy on Mac
description:
Public
Preview has provided IT admins with the ability to allow their users to receive
preview features before they are released to the public.  The existing follow Office preview
policy allows users to automatically be in the Public Preview Channel of Teams
if they are in the Office Current Channel (Preview) on Windows. We are now
expanding the "follow Office preview" policy to Mac users who are in
the Office Current Channel (Preview).
